author: ajsutton
content: We really are doing milestones backwards - <@!504202741933932544> has added support to Teku for creating the merge block so we can now do the transition by ourselves.  Hence, hit M2 with Geth.

author: ajsutton
content: I was still getting INVALID response from executePayload rather than SYNCING with this branch.  Tried with both --syncmode unspecified and with --syncmode full.

author: potuz
content: left running today for hours the exact same commands that eventually allows Terence to find peers and couldn't find any to start syncing.
